title: Am I perma-banned? No E-mail or Client message
body:
EDIT: That got resolved really fast, props to riot support. Looks like I got hacked, still honor 5. Seriously impressed with how fast that was

Id like thoughts on the question and not whether or not I deserve it, i'm not here to dispute that

I tried to log in yesterday but both the website and client claim that I'm using an invalid user/pass combo. I assumed I was hacked until I looked at my account through an alt and saw that I dropped from honor 5 to 0 after my last game.

I have never received a chat restriction in the last year or longer, no general suspensions, and a few Priority Queues (5~)

I did however AFK for roughly 5 minutes before we won my last game.

Like I said; no E-mail or Client message, just an inaccessible account.

I've had my account for 3~ years, own around 240 skins, and I used to be mildly toxic before season 5

My account name is -snip- Be, which I suppose COULD be considered offensive, but i'd gladly take a name change over a ban

replies.body: how in the fuck did you manage to get a fast response

seems like there are a lot of people being perma banned for no reason. I got perma banned out of the blue lol. I submitted a ticket and all we can do is wait but your not the only one. I still haven't gotten an email about why my account is even banned lol.
I'm literally waiting on a reply regarding a hacked permaban. I am super heated right now....
Glad to hear everything worked out!  If you have any other questions be sure to hit up your specialist in your ticket, the boards is a public venue and not the best for cases like this.
